recipesJson.name: Recipes Made Simple: Vanilla Custard
recipesJson.author: shakenvape007
recipesJson.description:
A Simple Vanilla Custard  that is a thick bold vanilla custard. Using this base you can be creative and add dark fruits like blueberry, yumberry, stawberry. For me I added some Tpa coconut candy at .75%  and subbed out tpa sweeter for cappella super sweet at .25. Have fun with it ğŸ˜€

http://www.diymixerscrew.com

Check us out on facebook.. New mixers always welcome!! https://www.facebook.com/groups/456512471380574
Check The video of this mix on youtube.. Recipe here mixed Live -----> https://youtu.be/yKxE1ieLklI

reviews.text: This stuff is good! Both the wife and I enjoy it! ğŸ™‚ There's not a long steep time it seems... I'm only on day 3 or 4 maybe it has to do with the Holy Vanilla but whatever the reason this is simple and easy and delicious! Keep up the great work with the simple recipes! I've been mixing for quite some time now (3+) and it's always nice to see an enjoyable simple recipe... Even for us older mixers! Nice work! ğŸ‘ğŸ‘
